cinnamon.engine.system

Interface Config<E>


  • public interface Config<E>

    Config is a small set-and-forget object meant to define configurations of objects such as GameObjectManager.GObjects and ImageComponents and apply such configurations when needed automatically. In the case of the GObject, a Config definition may choose the appropriate Texture and BodyComponent to create a standard game actor that can easily be reproduced by the GObjectFactory simply by submitting the Config's name.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Modifies a E.
